SUpload 上传组件

On this page
Table of Contents for current page

SUpload 上传组件 ​

组件增强目的

  • 业务代码编写较少50%；
  • 上传文件大小限制功能；
  • 文件预览列表可视高度控制；

扩展功能 ​

控制文件上传大小 ​

设置 maxSize 值可直接控制文件上传大小

  • press delete to remove
  • press delete to remove
  • press delete to remove

限制上传大小
通过配置增加属性maxSize可控制上传文件大小
<template>
    <IUpload :maxSize="90" :multiple="true" list-type="picture-card" :file-list="fileList">
        <el-button type="primary">上传文件</el-button>
    </IUpload>
  
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">
import { reactive } from 'vue';
import { IUpload } from 'element-plus-intensifier'
let fileList = reactive([
    {
        name: "food.jpeg",
        url: "https://fuss10.elemecdn.com/3/63/4e7f3a15429bfda99bce42a18cdd1jpeg.jpeg",
    },
    {
        name: "plant-1.png",
        url: "https://img.tukuppt.com/photo-big/00/00/94/6152bc0ce6e5d805.jpg",
    },
    {
        name: "food.jpeg",
        url: "https://www.ssfiction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/20200805_5f2b1669e9a24.jpg",
    },
])
</script>
<template>
    <IUpload :maxSize="90" :multiple="true" list-type="picture-card" :file-list="fileList">
        <el-button type="primary">上传文件</el-button>
    </IUpload>
  
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">
import { reactive } from 'vue';
import { IUpload } from 'element-plus-intensifier'
let fileList = reactive([
    {
        name: "food.jpeg",
        url: "https://fuss10.elemecdn.com/3/63/4e7f3a15429bfda99bce42a18cdd1jpeg.jpeg",
    },
    {
        name: "plant-1.png",
        url: "https://img.tukuppt.com/photo-big/00/00/94/6152bc0ce6e5d805.jpg",
    },
    {
        name: "food.jpeg",
        url: "https://www.ssfiction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/20200805_5f2b1669e9a24.jpg",
    },
])
</script>

限制文件预览列表高度 ​

  • food.jpeg
    press delete to remove
  • plant-1.png
    press delete to remove
  • food.jpeg
    press delete to remove

限制上传大小
通过配置增加属性maxSize可控制上传文件大小
<template>
    <IUpload :max-show-height="50" :multiple="true" list-type="picture" :file-list="fileList">
        <el-button type="primary">上传文件</el-button>
    </IUpload>
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">

import { reactive } from 'vue';
import { IUpload } from 'element-plus-intensifier'
let fileList = reactive([
    {
        name: "food.jpeg",
        url: "https://fuss10.elemecdn.com/3/63/4e7f3a15429bfda99bce42a18cdd1jpeg.jpeg",
    },
    {
        name: "plant-1.png",
        url: "https://img.tukuppt.com/photo-big/00/00/94/6152bc0ce6e5d805.jpg",
    },
    {
        name: "food.jpeg",
        url: "https://www.ssfiction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/20200805_5f2b1669e9a24.jpg",
    },
])
</script>
<template>
    <IUpload :max-show-height="50" :multiple="true" list-type="picture" :file-list="fileList">
        <el-button type="primary">上传文件</el-button>
    </IUpload>
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">

import { reactive } from 'vue';
import { IUpload } from 'element-plus-intensifier'
let fileList = reactive([
    {
        name: "food.jpeg",
        url: "https://fuss10.elemecdn.com/3/63/4e7f3a15429bfda99bce42a18cdd1jpeg.jpeg",
    },
    {
        name: "plant-1.png",
        url: "https://img.tukuppt.com/photo-big/00/00/94/6152bc0ce6e5d805.jpg",
    },
    {
        name: "food.jpeg",
        url: "https://www.ssfiction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/20200805_5f2b1669e9a24.jpg",
    },
])
</script>

示例 ​

文件大小限制 ​

列表高度显示控制 ​

属性 ​

TIP

...代表属性参考 element-plus官方文档

名称描述类型默认值必填
...............
maxSize上传文件大小（kb）number——否
maxShowListHeight文件列表最大可现实高度number——否
